subject: p13031876
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to prior study obtained the same day earlier. The Dobbhoff tube tip is currently in the stomach. The heart size and mediastinum is stable, but there is substantial interval improvement in pulmonary edema.
